import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; export default function Weather() { const [weather,setWeather] = useState({}); let currentCity = "Berlin"; let temperature = { celsius: 20, fahrenheit: 68 }; let weatherData = { icon: , date: "Tuesday 16 February 15:12", conditions: "Rainy", humidity: 80, wind: 16 }; let apiKey = `aae79086babd8e5274d8186968279eae`; let url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${apiKey}&units=metric`; axios.get(url).then(showWeather); function handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); } return (
